page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {FAMILY LIFE} Mrs Shaw has two children and used to live in the centre of Pershore before she moved to Drakes Broughton, just outside Pershore. The Shaw family moved house because they wanted to live in a bigger house but were sad to leave Pershore. During the week she teaches but in her spare time she does art and music. Sometimes the family go out at the weekend but only locally. If they don't she does work for her job or reads. Mrs Shaw noticed that there were a lot of people moving in and out of the area, probably because they are middle class, upwardly mobile type of young executive. On Sunday Mrs Shaw and family go to church and sometimes they have visitors afterwards.
